name: Coffee Quest (StarzzDrak)
description: Game made in less than 60 hours for games factory jam, post jam updates soon (i hope) now i'm really tired so lemme just go to sleep cya. Oh and you have to find your way to exit portal (red one) on your way there will be enemies just click on em with left mouse button, there is also one minimap hidden which you will look at by just moving your cursor above it.
